title: Isle Royale National Park: Isle Royale Seaplanes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Transportation Services     Isle Royale Seaplanes                Isle Royale Seaplanes         Isle Royale seaplane readying for takeoff.   Isle Royale Seaplanes offers the Cessna 206 amphibious seaplane as transportation between Houghton, MI and either Windigo on the west end or Rock Harbor on the northeast end of the island.  Throughout the operating season the seaplane's schedule varies; it typically operates from mid-May through mid-September.  Overnight and day-trip visits are offered.  Flight time one-way is 35 minutes.   For schedules, fare information, or to make a reservation, please visit their website.
